channel.title: Ardi v2 chaotic cbow and staff fix please help
channel.description:
so i have added the customs in the client side and server side but i cant get the crossbow to use any bolts or arrows for that matter and i added it into bows int
and for the staff i dont know how to make it so i can autocast any magic at all with it (autocast box dosnt show up) its as if it were a melee weapon
if u can help id be very greatful
